title: A briefe discourse of the scriptures Declaring the seuerall stories, liues, and deaths, of the fathers, from the Creation of Adam, vnto the death of Ioseph: very necessarie to be read and practised, for easie vnderstanding of the Scriptures in a short time.
author: Hayne, Thomas, 1582-1645, attributed name. aut
publisher: By W. White dwelling in Cow-lane,
